materials.raw_text:
B (Boron): 10 g 
 Co (Cobalt): 40 g 
 Sc (Scandium): 2 g 
 Ti (Titanium): 16 g 
 Zn (Zinc): 4 g

sourcing.instructions:
B: Purchase from chemical suppliers or online chemical stores. 
 Co: Obtain from metal suppliers or online marketplaces. 
 Sc: Source from specialized rare metal suppliers. 
 Ti: Available at metal supply stores or online. 
 Zn: Obtain from hardware stores or online suppliers.

steps: 1. Remove the solid sample from the crucible.
